mapper.select: select e.empno, e.emp_number, e.emp_name, e.emp_email, e.emp_resident_number, d.dname, r.rank_name, e.emp_join_date from employee e, dept d, rank r where d.deptno=e.deptno and r.rank_no=e.rank_no order by e.emp_number
select emp_number from employee where emp_number = #{emp_number, jdbcType=INTEGER}

select e.emp_number, e.emp_name, e.emp_email, e.emp_resident_number, e.emp_email, e.emp_tel, e.emp_mobile, e.emp_addr1, e.emp_addr2, e.emp_join_date, e.emp_retire_date, e.emp_retire_reason, d.deptno, d.dname, r.rank_no, r.rank_name, dt.duty_no, dt.duty_name, b.bank_no, b.bank_name ,e.emp_account_num, e.emp_account_holder, e.emp_profile, e.emp_attach_file, e.emp_etc from employee e, dept d, rank r, duty dt, bank b where d.deptno=e.deptno and r.rank_no=e.rank_no and e.duty_no=dt.duty_no and e.bank_no=b.bank_no and e.emp_number = #{emp_number}
select e.emp_number, e.emp_name, d.dname from employee e, dept d

select a.emp_appoint_no, to_char(a.emp_appoint_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as emp_appoint_date,e.emp_number,e.emp_name,a.next_rank,a.next_dept,e.rank_no,e.deptno from emp_appoint a, employee e where a.empno = e.empno order by a.emp_appoint_date desc

select a.emp_appoint_no, a.empno, to_char(a.emp_appoint_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as emp_appoint_date,e.emp_number,e.emp_name, e.deptno, e.rank_no, a.prev_rank,a.next_rank,a.prev_dept,a.next_dept from emp_appoint a, employee e where a.empno = e.empno and a.emp_appoint_no = #{emp_appoint_no, jdbcType=INTEGER}

select e.emp_number, e.emp_name, e.emp_email, e.emp_resident_number, d.dname, r.rank_name, e.emp_join_date from employee e, dept d, rank r where d.deptno=e.deptno and r.rank_no=e.rank_no and (e.emp_name like '%'||#{empinfo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' or d.dname like '%'||#{empinfo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%') order by e.emp_number
select rank_no,rank_name from rank order by rank_no
select duty_no,duty_name from duty order by duty_no
select bank_no,bank_name from bank order by bank_no
select COUNT(*) from employee where emp_number = #{emp_number}

select e.empno, e.emp_number, e.emp_name, e.emp_email, e.emp_resident_number, d.dname, r.rank_name, e.emp_join_date from retired_employee e, dept d, rank r where d.deptno=e.deptno and r.rank_no=e.rank_no order by e.emp_number

select e.emp_number, e.emp_name, e.emp_email, e.emp_resident_number, d.dname, r.rank_name, e.emp_join_date from retired_employee e, dept d, rank r where d.deptno=e.deptno and r.rank_no=e.rank_no and (e.emp_name like '%'||#{empinfo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' or d.dname like '%'||#{empinfo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%') order by e.emp_number
